entry.title: Hello Gridea
entry.summary:
👏 Welcome to Gridea!
✍️ Gridea A static blog writing client. You can use it to record your life, mood, knowledge, notes, creativity...
entry.content:
👏 Welcome to Gridea!
✍️ Gridea A static blog writing client. You can use it to record your life, mood, knowledge, notes, creativity...

Github
Gridea Homepage
Sample website

Features👇

📝 You can use the coolest Markdown syntax for quick creation

🌉 You can match the article with a beautiful cover image and insert an image anywhere in the article

🏷️ You can group articles by tags

📋 You can customize the menu and even create external link menus

💻 You can use this client on Windows, MacOS or Linux devices

🌎 You can use 𝖦𝗂𝗍𝗁𝗎𝖻 𝖯𝖺𝗀𝖾𝗌 or Coding Pages to show the world that more platforms will be supported in the future

💬 You can perform simple configuration and access Gitalk or DisqusJS comment system

🇬🇧 You can use Chinese Simplified or English

🌁 You can use the default theme in the app or any third-party theme at will, with powerful theme customization capabilities

🖥 You can customize the source folder and use OneDrive, Baidu network disk, iCloud, Dropbox, etc. for multi-device synchronization

🌱 Of course Gridea is still very young and has many shortcomings, but please believe that it will keep moving forward 🏃

In the future, it will definitely become your inseparable partner

Give full play to your talents!
😘 Enjoy~
